name: Project A.P.E.
description:
By Nomad Interactive

Project A.P.E. is a 4-player arena FPS where the player takes on the role of an augmented ape. The objective of the game is to get a certain amount of kills with one's weapon to advance to the next weapon in one's tailored loadout. The first player to progress through his/her entire loadout wins. Project A.P.E. is a fast-paced, easy-to-learn experience you can share with your friends over and over again.

The game is made by 16 students during a 10 week period. There are no servers to host the game which means that players has to connect to eachother via LAN or services like Hamachi.

A.P.E. on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProjectAPEgame?

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXvfnlDlV-bD25jyZ...
